text: Caligiuri is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Daniel Caligiuri, German-Italian footballer (soccer player) *Fred Caligiuri, American baseball player *Marco Caligiuri, German-Italian footballer (soccer player) *Paul Caligiuri, American footballer (soccer player) *Sam Caligiuri, American politician ==See also== *42365 Caligiuri, a main-belt asteroid *Richard Caliguiri, American politician Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Caligiuri
